name: Aladian Trading PLC
tagline: Building resilient supply chains and transformative manufacturing ventures in Ethiopia.
vision: To become Ethiopia's most trusted integrated trading and manufacturing group, advancing quality industries and inclusive prosperity.
mission: We source, produce, and distribute essential goods responsibly while empowering local talent, strengthening infrastructure, and delivering sustainable value to partners and communities.
objectives: Expand diversified manufacturing capacity with globally benchmarked quality systems.
Develop reliable distribution networks that prioritize customer success and resilience.
Nurture an empowered workforce through continual learning, safety, and wellbeing.
Forge ethical partnerships that elevate local suppliers and international collaborators.
Invest in technology and infrastructure that future-proof Ethiopia's industrial growth.

address.landmark: In front of Ethiopian Electric Utility HQ

meta.title: Aladian Trading PLC | Diversified Trading & Manufacturing in Ethiopia
meta.description: Aladian Trading PLC is a diversified Ethiopian enterprise spanning manufacturing, distribution, construction materials, agro-processing, and infrastructure services.
